item.title: You've got to find what you love - Steve Job
item.description: Stanford Report, June 14, 2005 ‘You’ve got to find what you love,’ Jobs says http://news-service.stanford.edu/news/2005/june15/jobs-061505.html Very inspiring piece This is the text of the Commencement address by Steve Jobs, CEO of Apple Computer and of Pixar Animation Studios, delivered on June 12, 2005. I am honored to be with you today at your commencement from one of the finest universities in the world. I never graduated from college.
